name: JAX and Keras
description: Python libraries for large-scale machine learning

projects.summary: Improving the user experience and performance when using JAX with Keras by integrating more features and fixing existing issues.
Creating comprehensive tutorials for advanced users of JAX and Keras, covering topics such as custom layer creation and optimization techniques.
Developing a robust automated testing framework for JAX and Keras projects to ensure reliability and consistency across versions.
Establishing a set of benchmarks for evaluating the performance of models built with JAX and Keras compared to traditional frameworks.
